title: 2.2 Master Challenge 1
question:
We know that microbes such as viruses multiply quickly and spread fast. In the light of the recent pandemic, create a project demonstrating the spread of viruses.
When the (green flag) is clicked, a virus sprite should appear. When the virus is touched, multiple viruses should emerge and spread out on the stage.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - scratch - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
